thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Samantha

author: Samantha
title: Samantha
text: The whole team at Motorama were very friendly and helped me trade in and buy my new car. So easy going and helpful, and didn't pressure us into increasing our budget, or buying anything until we were certain. They encouraged me to test drive as many cars as I wanted to get a feel for the cars. They were such a pleasure to do business with, we came back a week later for my partner to buy his first car too! Great service, would definitely recommend! :D
